title: Hey Duggee - Scarecrow Badge
cardDescription: The Scarecrow Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 9 and has a scarecrow along with the crows in the background with an orange rectangle frame.
description: The Scarecrow Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 9 and has a scarecrow along with the crows in the background with an orange rectangle frame.

content.content: Badge is done working around the starting chain.

content: ch 5, 2 sc to 2nd ch from hook, 2 sc, 4 sc into last ch, 2 sc, 2 sc to first ch [12]
sc, 3 sc in next st, 6 sc, 3 sc in next st, 2 sc, 3 sc in next st, 6 sc, 3 sc in next st, sc [28]
2 sc, 3 sc in next st, 8 sc, 3 sc in next st, 4 sc, 3 sc in next st, 8 sc, 3 sc in next st, 2 sc [36]
3 sc, 3 sc in next st, 10 sc, 3 sc in next st, 6 sc, 3 sc in next st, 10 sc, 3 sc in next st, 3 sc [44]
sl st with SC, 3 hdc, inc hdc, 12 hdc, inc hdc, 8 hdc, inc hdc, 12 hdc, inc hdc, 5 hdc where last one is made in first slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.

content: with red ch 11, starting from 3rd ch from hook, 9 hdc, fasten off [9]
attach red to 3rd hdc, 3 sc, turn [3]
ch 2, slst into same st, (ch 2, slst to next) x2

content.content: Sew in place. Try to tuck the stitches at the hem of the body so that the hem forms an upside-down crown shape.

content: with beige 6 sc into magic loop, slst
with yellow ch 3, starting from 2nd ch from hook 2 sc

content.content: Leave a long tail for sewing. Place the hat on top of the head and use the tail to sew the brim of the hat.

content: Use the yellow tail (or new yarn) to sew hands.
Sew five black birds and two black eyes.
